about-python.html.title: About Python
about-python.html.header_content: This is a post that tells about python in my perspective and my knowledge
content: python is a programming language in industry 4.0 that has a large community, fast in typing, but sometimes slower for some things, just requires experience to make it faster. I am interested in python. I am been using python for 1 year, I almost forgot about web development, then Rohamunira Web this project is to reincarnate my web development knowledge.
Python programming language for me is very striking because many package that i know. i've been learning, Json, Playwright, Flet UI, Flask Jinja, And many other things.
